file_content.text: [Gaden Ko approaches, now that you have made the path safe]
Outsider, you are not--Gaden-Ko. What happened?
It doesn't matter, he needs medical attention.
Please, just treat him.
I take it you know each other.
You've met?
All potentials are known.
A Sith Lord tried to assassinate him, to discredit the Republic.
It was an Imperial plot!
Foolishness.
Come, Gaden-Ko. To the healers.
You are known. You may follow, show respect.
The shrine is not for you.
I should stay with Gaden-Ko. There may be another attempt on his life.
But he needs protection.
The shrine is guarded.
And I thought being a Jedi Master would get me into all the best shrines.
No exceptions for Jedi?
I don't need your permission.
The shrine is not for you.
The trials protect the upper levels. They are for Mystics.
What do these trials involve, exactly?
About the trials...
The curious see themselves.
I honor your traditions, but I must get inside.
I'm ready to attempt them.
I survived the Jedi trials.
You show respect. You aided a pilgrim and Gaden-Ko.
If you seek the shrine's upper levels, the trials remain. Go to the proving grounds.
Only those who respect our ways enter the trials. Suva-Rak at the pilgrim's camp can explain.
I will inform Gaden-Ko if you die.
You may go inside. Show respect.
Respect our ways. The trials wait.
Suva-Rak will guide you through ignorance.
